unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics - Are You *Really* Seeing the Whole Picture?**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics - Are You Really Seeing the Whole Picture?

unnormalised: Hey fam! Ever feel like your Insta game is strong, but the analytics are… well, kinda meh? You're not alone! Turns out, those follower counts might be hiding a whole lotta bots and inactive accounts.
normalised: Hey fam! Ever feel like your Insta game is strong, but the analytics are… well, kinda meh? You are not alone! Turns out, those follower counts might be hiding a whole lotta bots and inactive accounts.

unnormalised: Recent reports suggest that up to 30% of followers on some Indian influencers' profiles could be fake. That's a huge chunk, especially when brands are shelling out big Rs. for collaborations!
normalised: Recent reports suggest that up to thirty percent of followers on some Indian influencers' profiles could be fake. That is a huge chunk, especially when brands are shelling out big rupees for collaborations!

unnormalised: Think about it: Are those 100k followers *really* engaging with your Onam special biryani recipe post? Or are they just… there?
normalised: Think about it: Are those one hundred thousand followers really engaging with your Onam special biryani recipe post? Or are they just… there?

unnormalised: Experts at IIM Bangalore are now offering workshops to help influencers understand *real* engagement vs. vanity metrics. They're diving deep into audience demographics, tracking genuine interactions, and flagging suspicious activity.
normalised: Experts at I I M Bangalore are now offering workshops to help influencers understand real engagement versus vanity metrics. They are diving deep into audience demographics, tracking genuine interactions, and flagging suspicious activity.

unnormalised: Pro tip: Look beyond the follower number. Check for consistent likes, comments from real people (not just generic "Awesome post!" comments), and engagement that aligns with your target audience in cities like Mumbai or Chennai.
normalised: Pro tip: Look beyond the follower number. Check for consistent likes, comments from real people (not just generic "Awesome post!" comments), and engagement that aligns with your target audience in cities like Mumbai or Chennai.

unnormalised: Don't get caught in the fake follower trap! Time to clean house and focus on building a *real* community. Your brand (and your wallet) will thank you for it.
normalised: Don't get caught in the fake follower trap! Time to clean house and focus on building a real community. Your brand (and your wallet) will thank you for it.
